author: Tim Higgins
title: Tesla Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Tesla Inc. is expected to release fourth-quarter financial results after the market closes Wednesday. Hereâ€™s what you need to know:
EARNINGS FORECAST: Tesla is expected to post an adjusted loss of $3.15 a share, according to analysts surveyed by FactSet, compared with an adjusted 69 cent-a-share loss a year earlier. Adjusted results exclude stock-based and acquisition costs, and other items.
